alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 11:09AM PST until December 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 6,000 FEET... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 to 12 inches above 6,000 feet. Localized amounts up to 1-2 feet over the highest peaks. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada above 6,000 feet, including Donner Pass and Echo Summit. * WHEN...From 10 PM PST Friday to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow covered road conditions. The hazardous conditions could make holiday weekend mountain travel very difficult with delays and chain controls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 6,000 to 7,000 Friday, lowering to around 5,500 to 6,000 feet Saturday morning. Heaviest amounts expected overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
